00047 typedef enum
00048 {

00254 /******************************************************************************************
00255   * @name SVC
00256   * SVC related parameters.
00257   * Encoder support encoding of the base layer plus several spatial and quality enhancement
00258   * layers above it in "linear" order. SVC encoding is controlled by "svc_settings_t" structure.
00259   * This structure defines the number of SVC layers (0 means no SVC) and properties layers.
00260   * Properties of each SVC layer is defined in the "svc_layer_settings_t" structure.
00261   */
00262 // @{
00263 
00264 
00270 typedef enum
00271 {
00272     SVC_ADAPTIVE_BASEMODE_FLAG = 0x01,
00273     SVC_ADAPTIVE_RES_PRED_FLAG = 0x02,
00274     SVC_ADAPTIVE_MV_PRED_FLAG = 0x04,
00275 
00276     SVC_DEFAULT_BASEMODE_FLAG = 0x10,
00277     SVC_DEFAULT_RES_PRED_FLAG = 0x20,
00278     SVC_DEFAULT_MV_PRED_FLAG = 0x40
00279 } svc_flags_e;
00280 
00281 
00286 typedef enum
00287 {
00288     SVC_EXTEND_2X2 = 0,  //spatial extend twice in both direction (spatial scalability)
00289     SVC_EXTEND_1X1 = 1,  //no spatial extend (coarse-grain quality scalability)
00290     SVC_MGS_EXTEND = 2,  //no spatial extend (medium-grain quality scalability)
00291     SVC_EXTEND_1_5 = 15, //spatial 1.5 extend in both direction
00292     SVC_EXTEND_CUSTOM = 100 //Custom spatial scalability.
00293 } svc_spatial_extend_e;
00294 
00302 typedef struct svc_layer_settings_t
00303 {
00304     int profile_idc;    
00305     int level_idc;      
00306     svc_spatial_extend_e extend; 
00307     int num_mgs_slices; //number of slices to split coefs (valid only for MGS extend)
00308     unsigned int mgs_coeffs; // i.e. 0xB73 - means coefs [0-3] into slice0; [4-7] - slice1; [8-11] - slice2; [12-15] slice3
00309     //zero - means automatic calculation
00310 
00311     unsigned int flags_i; 
00312     unsigned int flags_p; 
00313     unsigned int flags_b; 
00314     int sym_mode;   
00315     int kbps;  
00316     int max_kbps; 
00317     int qp_intra; 
00318     speed_settings_t speed; 
00319     slice_settings_t slice; 
00320     
00321     byte vui_aspect_ratio_idc; 
00322     byte res[3];
00323     uint16_t vui_sar_width;        
00324     uint16_t vui_sar_height;       
00325 
00326     //In all encoding modes except SVC_EXTEND_CUSTOM, Parameters below are "output" parameters.
00327     //They will be calculated by encoder in v4e_open() function.
00328     //If SVC_EXTEND_CUSTOM encoding extend is used in any layer, only last layer dimensions will be calculated.
00329     //all other dimensions including base-layer must be set by caller.
00330     int frame_width;    
00331     int frame_height;   
00332 } svc_layer_settings_t;

00354 typedef struct svc_settings_t
00355 {
00356     int num_layers; 
00357     int key_picture_period; //Used for MGS encoding
00358     int temporal_mode; // 0 - no temporal scalability; 1 - non-reference frames to separate temporal layer
00359     int multistream_mode; // See multistream_modes_e enum
00360     int flags; //Bitwise svc/mvc/multistream encoding flags; see multi_stream_flags_e enum
00362     svc_layer_settings_t layer[MAX_SVC_LAYERS];
00363 } svc_settings_t;
